sources.title: Vieni Avanti Cretino
sources.description: Oddly amusing film from Italy featuring Lino Banfi as a hapless loser drifting from job to job with a rather surreal twist at the end. Sort of like when the Monty Python would realize they were done with a scene and just go off topic. Michela Miti provides the only nudity. Italian with optional English subtitles. Note that the subtitles are also provided as a separate file.

metadata.Plot: The funny misadventures of a simpleton just out of jail, looking for a job until the very surreal ending.
metadata.Writer: Lino Banfi, Franco Bucceri, Roberto Leoni
metadata.Actors: Lino Banfi, Franco Bracardi, Adriana Russo
